name: IoT Bathroom Monitor
tagline: Using a Particle Photon to monitor bathroom open/close status in a building
body:
### Authors and Contributors
Currently, Michael Schlecht(@mischlecht) is developing the website using Node.js and a variety of other technologies and I(@hasti123) am developing the Particle Photon prototype.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with IoT? Sorry to hear that.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
